Respond to an emailFrom: Ken SmithTo: Aaron Devlin, President, First Insurance AgencySubject: Interview .Sent: March 29, 8:16 A.M.Dear Mr. Devlin,I have a job interview scheduled for next Monday at 3:00 P.M. However, I am afraid there have been some changes in my current schedule, so I have to work until late at night that day. Could you possibly reschedule my interview date? I look forward to meeting you soon.Best regards,Ken SmithDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are Aaron Devlin. In your e-mail, suggest TWO possible times for holding the interview and request ONE item that Ken Smith should bring with him.

emailDetails.to: Aaron Devlin, President, First Insurance Agency
emailDetails.subject: Interview .
emailDetails.content: Dear Mr. Devlin,I have a job interview scheduled for next Monday at 3:00 P.M. However, I am afraid there have been some changes in my current schedule, so I have to work until late at night that day. Could you possibly reschedule my interview date? I look forward to meeting you soon.Best regards,Ken SmithDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are Aaron Devlin. In your e-mail, suggest TWO possible times for holding the interview and request ONE item that Ken Smith should bring with him.

questions.context: Respond to an emailFrom: Randy Emerick, Assistant to Vice-PresidentTo: All staffSubject: Vice-president's retirement partySent: January 27, 1:15 P.M.Vice-President Jerry Silveria’s retirement party will take place at the Grand Traverse Resort on February 9 at 7:00 P.M. We are asking that employees help with preparations for the party, such as decorations, setting up tables, and so on.Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are an employee at this company. In your e-mail, ask TWO questions and make ONE suggestion about organizing the party.

emailDetails.subject: Vice-president's retirement party
emailDetails.content: Vice-President Jerry Silveria's retirement party will take place at the Grand Traverse Resort on February 9 at 7:00 P.M. We are asking that employees help with preparations for the party, such as decorations, setting up tables, and so on.Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are an employee at this company. questions.context: Writing essaysSome people like taking one long vacation each year. Others enjoy taking several shorter vacations. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your choice.
